document.full_text: los angeles clippers forward blake griffin, whose soaring dunks became staples of nightly highlight shows, was named nba rookie of the year on wednesday as the first unanimous choice in 21 years.
document.title: blake griffin unanimously voted nba's top rookie
lines_and_colors: los angeles clippers forward blake griffin, whose soaring dunks became staples of nightly highlight shows, was named nba rookie of the year on wednesday as the first unanimous choice in 21 years.
